title: Touch Screen
description: Small town romance with big hearts ready for love. The prodigal son.Gavin Scott never wanted to return to his small town.When he sees Britton McKay still lives there, he isn't sure he can ever leave again. A second chance.Britton McKay doesn't know if she can trust Gavin Scott, the man who broke her heart.Then again, she's the one keeping a secret from him. Can the truth bring Gavin home where his heart lives? A romance told through the heroâ€™s heart only. ***Welcome to Elk Rapids.  Enjoy the sweeter side of L.B. Dunbar in this small town, big hearts romance about family and love. Each book may be read as a standalone, but enjoyed collectively, if you like stories that weave together the lives of families.
